articles.title: Indian economy to grow at 7.5% in 2024: World Bank | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Services and industry activity are expected to push India's output growth to reach 7.5% in FY24, as per the World Bank. It added that growth is expected to moderate to 6.6% over the medium term.
articles.content: The Indian economy is projected to grow at 7.5 percent in 2024, the World Bank has said, revising its earlier projections for the same period by 1.2 percent. The World Bank forecasts India's output g… [+6195 chars]
